text: Avoid the MSI GF Series GF63 Thin 9RCX-659 15.6" 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i5 9th Gen 9300H (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 128 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop if you can. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The screen developed dead pixels within a month.. Looking to return it.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the MSI GF Series GF63 Thin 9RCX-659 15.6" 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i5 9th Gen 9300H (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 128 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It performance throttles under load frequently when playing Starfield, and the performance throttles significantly. The port selection has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Had several issues with the MSI GF Series GF63 Thin 9RCX-659 15.6" 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i5 9th Gen 9300H (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 128 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop since day one. blue screens occasionally and the screen brightness feels cheap. Performance in competitive gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the MSI GF Series GF63 Thin 9RCX-659 15.6" 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i5 9th Gen 9300H (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 128 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It performance throttles under load frequently when playing Fortnite, and the performance throttles significantly. The fan noise has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the MSI GF Series GF63 Thin 9RCX-659 15.6" 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i5 9th Gen 9300H (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 128 GB NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It overheats frequently when playing Cyberpunk 2077, and the performance throttles significantly. The battery life has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.
